page.title: 07KINGS NORTON LANGUAGES
page.content: A {SURVEY}.We collected information on various aspects of {languages}.We asked parents what they spoke as their first language.98% spoke English.Gaelic and Welsh 1% each.We asked parents what they spoke as their second language.18 % spoke French.8% German.4% Latin.2% English.2% also spoke Italian. Hindust- ani,Arabic,Gaelic,Urdu,Spanish and Portuguese were all spoken 1% each. We asked people what accent they spoke with.86% have a Brummy {accent}.2% have a Northampton accent.Leicester,Stoke, Lancashire,Wales,Warwick and London 1/2% each.We asked parents what {slang} they used.Here are the most commonly used.Wally means fool or idiot.Booze means alcholic beverages and skint means I have no money.Here are the most commonly used childrenÂ£s {slang} language.Ace means very good.Scrap is fight.By Class 1 of Broadmeadow School.
